sellerCard.oneLiner: Vision Your World and Actualize it
sellerCard.description:
We are market-oriented, client-driven, and quality-focused group of professionals.
Our Services:
- E-Business (Websites, Web Applications, eCommerce Stores, Software).
- Brand Development (Brand Concept, Identity Designs, Logo, Social Media Marketing, etc.)
- Business Development (Business Plans, Marketing Plans, Data Analysis, & Reports).

With commitment to authenticated originality, we offer competitive prices â€“ and timely clearance of our milestones will contribute to our beneficial collaboration.

description.content:
(Please feel free to contact me before placing the order to discuss your requirements.)


Established in 2002, we have served over 3000 clients globally, providing complete online business solutions.


What do we offer?

  • Complete website services, from design and development to deployment.
  • Tailored towards your needs (eCommerce, Business Information, Web Applications, Landing Pages, Portfolio/Catalogues, Blogs, Booking Platforms, User Management System, etc.)
  • Visually engaging, clean, modern, and professional UI/UX web designs.
  • Implementation of optimal SEO strategies.
  • Unmatched site speed and user experience.
  • Fully responsive on all devices.


Our solutions take away all technical worries from you so you focus solely on running your business successfully!


Why us?

  • Business Growth & Returns.
  • WordPress/Shopify/CMSs Experts.
  • One-stop solution to all your IT and Design requirements.
  • Benchmark quality standards of Website Development.
  • Thousands of satisfied clients around the globe.
  • 2000+ website-related orders completed on Fiverr.
  • Prompt & Professional Responses.
  • We provide 3-month free-of-cost bug support in our original work, if any.


Order Now & Let's Develop Success!

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do I need before I get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer:
To develop any website, we need: 
- Domain 
- Hosting 
However, if you do not have any of the above available, please contact us and we can surely assist in arranging all.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Is Domain & hosting included in the package?
questionsAndAnswers.answer:
No, Domain & Hosting are a company's property registered to their name, that is provided by the client but we would love to help you find the best host domain registrar OR do all for you in a custom package

Please feel free to contact our support anytime and discuss your requirements in details.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is Hosting and why do I need it?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Hosting is online storage connected to www. It is required to "host" or store your website files and show it your visitors. Your domain links to this storage and shows visitors the site when URL is entered.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Which technologies do you cover/offer?
questionsAndAnswers.answer:
WordPress & WooCommerce 
Shopify
SquareSpace
Core Languages (HTML/CSS/JS/JQuery/PHP/ etc.)
Data Analytics

questionsAndAnswers.question: I am not sure what package is suitable for me?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No worries at all, please contact us right away and our IT Consultant will discuss your requirements and propose solution(s) accordingly.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you upload the site to my hosting account/server?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, this service is included in all packages. You just need to provide your hosting account information.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you set-up business emails on domain e.g., xyz@domain.com?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, we can set-up your business emails for whichever email solution you prefer. This is included with all packages.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What access and files I am given at the end?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Upon completion of the project, complete source code along with Administrator accesses for all accounts used is handed over to the client.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you cover projects related Crypto Currencies?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Please you may contact us with your requirements before placing the order, we cover all major fields including crypto.

reviews.comment:
Exceptional Speed, Quality, and Communication â€“ A True 5-Star Experience!
I canâ€™t express enough admiration for SMCSE. What was supposed to be a 15-day project, they delivered in just 9 days without cutting corners. Their speed alone was impressive, but what really set them apart was how much of the heavy lifting they handled. They took care of much of the research and even sourced many images themselves, saving me hours (if not days) of effort.

The final product is highly professional, ultra-optimized, and lightning-fast. There is no lag or clunky elementsâ€”just smooth, polished performance. And the biggest surprise? SEO was already included! I fully expected to write everything myself, so seeing that handled seamlessly was a fantastic bonus.

Another standout factor was their communication. Iâ€™m 12 hours ahead of them, yet I never felt the impact of the time difference. Iâ€™m an early riser and an early sleeper, so the only times I wasnâ€™t able to reach them were when it was literally midnight on their end. Even then, any minor revisions I requested were quickly and efficiently handled.

I also opted for an add-on that included a video guide for making small tweaks myself, and so far, itâ€™s been flawlessâ€”there have been zero issues.

The bottom line? They went above and beyond. They were fast, professional, and incredibly well-optimized. 10/10, or, in this case, 5 stars!

And a special shoutout to Atharâ€”an absolute gem! I had many questions and tiny tweaks, and he handled them all like a pro. Highly recommend!

Athar and his team delivered a solid website and completed the project impressively quickly. They are professional, efficient, and provided great value for money. A reliable team Iâ€™d recommend for similar projects.

I couldnâ€™t be happier with my website built for my business! From start to finish, their team demonstrated professionalism, creativity, and a genuine commitment to excellence. They took the time to understand my vision and goals, translating them into a sleek, user-friendly design that exceeded my expectations. I would highly recommend!

The project is great, we have still lot's of things to do. Specially at the end, We have a unfinished product. We are still open to continue the project with you, because communication is great. Athar is very professional.

seller_response.comment: The project was completed according to their specifications, and they expressed full satisfaction. Multiple people from their end were involved, sharing different information at times according to their understanding. While the order and website were completed weeks ago, the information is still being changed and unavailable. The project was delivered when one partner gave the green light, only for another to leave the remarks above and share new information. Happy to assist and make any updates anytime, as always.

reviews.comment: Absolutely phenomenal work! The team at SMCSE was so helpful and excellent to work with. They delivered an incredible website that we're so proud of! Highly encourage everyone who needs website development to choose SMCSE!

reviews_snippet.comment: SMCSE was wonderful to work with! They understood my business needs and expectations and went above and beyond with their deliverables. I will hire them again as soon as a new project arises with their exceptional skillset!

I had the pleasure of working with an incredible freelancer who built a website for my business, and I couldnâ€™t be happier with the result. From the very start, they were professional, polite, and extremely attentive to my needs. They took the time to understand my vision and provided valuable suggestions that enhanced the overall design and functionality of the website.

The delivery time was impressive! They completed the project ahead of schedule without compromising on quality. Every detail was carefully executed, and the site looks modern, responsive, and user-friendly.

Throughout the entire process, the freelancer was always available to answer questions and make adjustments where needed. Their communication skills and positive attitude made working with them a smooth and enjoyable experience. I highly recommend them to anyone in need of top-notch web development services!

I am highly recommending working with Athar and his team! I had the best experience from start to finish. Athar showed a deep understanding of what my project was about and was able to bring my vision to life in a way that exceeded my expectations.

The customer service was super quick and responsive, addressing all my questions and concerns with utmost patience and professionalism. Athar took all my wishes and considerations into account, ensuring that every aspect of the website met my requirements.

The design was flawless, capturing the essence of what I wanted perfectly. The execution was also impeccable; Athar and his team worked efficiently and delivered the project faster than I anticipated. I especially appreciated his love for detail, which truly set the final product apart.

Overall, it was a pleasure working with Athar, and I highly recommend his services to anyone looking for a top-notch website development experience.

SMCSE Solutions exceeded all our expectations with exceptional documentation and top-notch professionalism. Their deep understanding, quick responsiveness, and language fluency made the collaboration seamless. They are THE BEST we have ever worked with and created a fantastic site for us. If you need a website, **SMCSE Solutions** is the team to hire! ðŸ‘
Worth every penny.  So glad to have someone that actually cares about the project and website as much as we did!
